paper_abstract: The paper proves a pumping lemma for a certain subclass of mildly context-sensitive languages, the one defined by commutation-augmented pregroup grammars; in addition, an automaton equivalent to such grammars is introduced, augmenting push-down automata by cancellation in the bottom of its stack. paper_title: Commutation-augmented pregroup grammars and push-down automata with cancellation
